name: NovaonX Landing Page – Landing Page Builder
author: NovaonX

sections.description:
Landingpage NovaonX Builder Plugin – Developed by NovaonX. Building a landing page has never been easier with Drag & Drop feature and Optimize conversion within 5 minutes.

Landing Page Platform for Advertiser
Website: https://landingpage.novaonx.com/
Hashtag: #LandingPage #Landing Page
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins in your WordPress administration, click Add New, and search for “NovaonX Landing Page WordPress Plugin”.
  2. Now click at Install Now button.
  3. Click on Activate after upload has completed.
  4. Go to Settings and choose NovaonX Landingpage.
  5. Log into your Landing Page account at https://landingpage.novaonx.com/
  6. When publishing your landing page from NovaonX Landing Page, change thirdparty tab, choose WordPress.
sections.changelog:

1.1 (2019-07-01)

  • Update dashboard view
  • Update icon

1.0

Initial release.
